mn144:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
mn144:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmā ca channo gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti.
mn144:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
mn144:3.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahācundo tenupasaṅkami;
mn144:3.4_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā mahācundo āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosi.
mn144:4.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo yenāyasmā channo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn144:4.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
mn144:4.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ channaṁ etadavoca:
mn144:5.2_2: balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya;
mn144:5.4_2: balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṁ dadeyya;
mn144:5.6_2: dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṁ parikanteyya;
mn144:5.8_2: dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṁ purisaṁ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṁ samparitāpeyyuṁ;
mn144:5.10_0: Satthaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, āharissāmi, nāvakaṅkhāmi jīvitan”ti.
mn144:6.2_0: Yāpetāyasmā channo. Yāpentaṁ mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ channaṁ icchāma.
mn144:6.3_0: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni,
mn144:6.3_1: ahaṁ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhojanāni pariyesissāmi.
mn144:6.4_0: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhesajjāni,
mn144:6.4_1: ahaṁ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhesajjāni pariyesissāmi.
mn144:6.5_0: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi patirūpā upaṭṭhākā, ahaṁ āyasmantaṁ channaṁ upaṭṭhahissāmi.
mn144:6.7_0: Yāpetāyasmā channo. Yāpentaṁ mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ channaṁ icchāmā”ti.
mn144:7.1_0: “Napi me, āvuso sāriputta, natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni;
mn144:7.4_0: api cāvuso sāriputta, pariciṇṇo me satthā dīgharattaṁ manāpeneva no amanāpena.
mn144:7.5_0: Etañhi, āvuso sāriputta, sāvakassa patirūpaṁ yaṁ satthāraṁ paricareyya manāpeneva no amanāpena.
mn144:7.6_0: ‘Anupavajjaṁ channo bhikkhu satthaṁ āharissatī’ti evametaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, dhārehī”ti.
mn144:8.1_1: sace āyasmā channo okāsaṁ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
mn144:10.1_2: cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṁ disvā kiṁ abhiññāya cakkhuṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama,
mn144:10.6_2: manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṁ disvā kiṁ abhiññāya manaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama,
mn144:10.7_2: cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṁ disvā nirodhaṁ abhiññāya cakkhuṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama,
mn144:10.12_2: manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṁ disvā nirodhaṁ abhiññāya manaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama,
mn144:11.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā mahācundo āyasmantaṁ channaṁ etadavoca:
mn144:11.2_0: “tasmātiha, āvuso channa, idampi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ, niccakappaṁ manasi kātabbaṁ:
mn144:11.8_0: Cutūpapāte asati nevidha na huraṁ na ubhayamantarena.
mn144:11.10_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmantaṁ channaṁ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṁsu.
mn144:12.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā channo acirapakkante āyasmante ca sāriputte āyasmante ca mahācunde satthaṁ āharesi.
mn144:13.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn144:13.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn144:13.4_0: “Nanu te, sāriputta, channena bhikkhunā sammukhāyeva anupavajjatā byākatā”ti?
mn144:13.7_0: “Honti hete, sāriputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulāni suhajjakulāni upavajjakulāni.
mn144:13.9_0: Yo kho, sāriputta, imañca kāyaṁ nikkhipati aññañca kāyaṁ upādiyati tamahaṁ ‘saupavajjo’ti vadāmi.
mn144:13.11_0: ‘Anupavajjo channo bhikkhu satthaṁ āharesī’ti evametaṁ, sāriputta, dhārehī”ti.
mn144:13.13_0: Attamano āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
